p:
To ensure that any observed associations are not driven by the selection of individuals, we performed the following technical matching in the analyses; PD cases and PD controls were (additionally) matched on eight dichotomous variables:
1)
Does this person have celiac disease?
2)
Do any of this person’s siblings have celiac disease?
3)
Does either of this person’s parents have celiac disease?
4)
Do any of this person’s children have celiac disease?
5)
Does this person have diabetes?
6)
Do any of this person’s siblings have diabetes?
7)
Does either of this person’s parents have diabetes?
8)
Do any of this person’s children have diabetes?
